verses.name: John 20:21
verses.text: Then said Jesus to them again, Peace be unto you: as my Father hath sent me, even so send I you.

verses.name: John 20:22
verses.text: And when he had said this, he breathed on them, and saith unto them, Receive ye the Holy Ghost:

verses.name: John 20:23
verses.text: Whose soever sins ye remit, they are remitted unto them; and whose soever sins ye retain, they are retained.

verses.name: John 20:24
verses.text: But Thomas, one of the twelve, called Didymus, was not with them when Jesus came.
